overview.title: Diagnostics We Arrange
overview.content: Blood panels (hormones, thyroid, vitamins, sexual health), urine and stool tests, COVID & flu screens, ultrasound, X-ray, MRI, CT, DEXA, echocardiograms, and cardiac CT. We also coordinate niche tests such as allergy panels or fertility investigations.
highlights: Priority access to partner imaging suites
GP review and action plan for every result

faq.question: Do you offer walk-in blood tests?
faq.answer: We can accommodate urgent phlebotomy with short notice—call ahead so we can prepare kits.

faq.question: Can I use these results with my NHS GP?
faq.answer: Yes, we can share copies or liaise with your NHS team if you consent.

faq.question: Are imaging costs included?
faq.answer: Imaging centres bill separately, but we provide all pricing upfront.
